title: John Finucane – 2022 Comments on Restoring the Northern Ireland Executive
author: admin
summary: The comments made by John Finucane, the Sinn Fein MP for Belfast North, on 14 September 2022.
content:
With inflation still running at almost ten percent living costs remain far too high for ordinary people to cope with.
